text:
NurtureStars Preschool has been an incredible place for our child, Iris, over the past four years. The teachers and staff have shown outstanding care and dedication, creating a nurturing and supportive environment where Iris has thrived both academically and personally.

We are so grateful for their commitment to providing a safe, engaging, and joyful space for children. Thank you for making a lasting impact on Iris’s early years. Highly recommend NurtureStars Preschool to any parent looking for a wonderful preschool experience!  ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Good experience. My both children study inside, definitely recommend for others parents. This is the best preschool in Tampines I have ever meet. The teacher inside friendly and responsible, admin staff responsive, principal and vice principal love and care the children. I can feel the atmosphere is happy and cheerful. A lot activity and excursions for children. Definitely 5 Star !!!!!!!!!

DEFINITELY 5 STARS! My child has been with Nurturestars for the pass 3.5 years and we love it because the teachers are caring and responsible! There are also lots of parent involvement activities and the teachers are constantly updating us about my child's progress. More importantly, i am satisfied that my child will be well-prepared for preschool school.

Terrible experience since the good teachers are left...
The deleted comment for this school is so true"only hardware no heartware" ! Don't go!
